name: Moorland Sonata
description:
MOORLAND SONATA

An eerie point and click puzzle game. No saves, no loads: a one-shot short story!

A strange and cold night in the moorland. Follow the moon into a dreamy time-distorted reality.

The pale lady needs your help: what is your choice?

HOW TO PLAY:

Mouse Left Click: Navigate, collect, equip and use items

Mouse Right Click: Drop equipped items

FEATURES:

. Hand drawn backgrounds and animations.

. Immersive atmosphere inspired by "The Demoiselle d'Ys", a ghost story by Robert W. Chambers 

. Two different endings (collect all the secrets!)

. English and Italian languages.

INSTALL INSTRUCTIONS:

No installation needed! Just unzip and enjoy.

IMPORTANT: 

. If you have issues with the mouse speed, you can easily fix it in the Gamesetup located in the same folder which includes the exe.

. Also, you can change the game language and the resolution in the Gamesetup.

AUTHOR COMMENT:

No owls were burned in a ritual during the game development!

This game is totally free, but it took a lot of work, time and energy! If you like my ideas/projects/arts, please consider making a donation:
you will help me to create more games!
